member.name: M:Terrasoft.DB.MSSql.SqlErrorPattern.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Byte},System.Nullable{System.Byte},System.String)
member.summary: Represents a set of properties, that is used to identify particular .
member.param: Descriptive short string to identify the pattern.
Number of the error, which corresponds to column [message_id] in Sql Server sys.messages table. See .Number property.
Class of the error, which corresponds to column [severity] in Sql Server sys.messages table. See .Class property.
State of the error, which corresponds to column [severity] in Sql Server sys.messages table. See .Message property.
String to be found in .Message property.
